lead_paragraph: The track coach Trevor Graham asked a judge to toss out his conviction for making false statements to federal doping investigators. Graham argued in court papers that even if he did lie, he said nothing to hinder the investigation of Marion Jones and other athletes suspected of lying to authorities about their drug use.
